TopicTitle: Prototype Rocket game in Development. (Redesigning due to game corruption)

Articles.Content:
COMPLETE REDESIGN DUE TO GAME CORRUPTION

Its made in construct 2, its in pre-alpha...

A rocket game made from pre made rockets made by me.

And here are some shots.

Leaving the pad.

What happens if u crash on it D:

Changelog from my head:

V.001: Basic Terrain added, Rocket, Control systems. Engine control was only on and off.

V.002: Improved Terrain, Seaside added.

V.01: Major overhaul. Scale reduced to 30%. Fuel systems added in Basic form

V.025: Throttle added. GUI added.

V.05: GUI improved, Damageable Structures implemented.

V.075: Super Bug fixing, Terrain Overhaul.

Current Version(V.0.8): More bugs smoshed. GUI overhaul again...

Green is Added. Yellow is Partially. Red is not in yet.

- GUI (WIP)

- Damageable Structures

- Engine Throttle

- Flight (Limited up to Uppermost Atmosphere)

- BOOM BOOM

- Fuel (No mass)

- Menu

- Selecting different rockets/launch sites

- Different jobs you must do e.g Carry a x satellite to y orbit for z cash

- Orbit physics

- Orbital view

- Stages (No effects, Makeshift, Stages pasted as one object (not multiple).)

- Budgets

As you can see, I got alot to cover X_X.

Download link when It makes it outta pre-Alpha.

Suggestions and feedback can work.

-Cheers

Edited December 1, 2013 by rasheed

One of the rockets u would be able to launch.

Another one.

This looks neat, what are you using to make this or how are you making this?

*Edit*

My bad, I'm blind today...
NOTE: Take notes that im only 13 years old. So please excuse my poor skillz

This looks neat

What he said.
I would lie to give it a try! Seems pretty promising.
ahaha dont try it now. Trust me u will be VERY disappointed right now >

Please use you instead of u.

Indeed, it seems like a fun thing to try. I can be a tester if you want.

New progress report.

Almost complete redesign of the game.

Star = Vironi

Earth = Diraisa

Moon = Lunia

Mars = Weidhna

NOTE: Its not gonna be based on the real solar system nor the kerbal system.
I'd love to make suggestions to help improve your game, But Like a Car, I can't say anything without a test drive of sorts..
Nice looking solar system.
I like how it looks, nice and simple

Report!

Managed to get the gravity on. Its currently using the Newton's Universal Law of Gravitation so far.
You really should release a alpha version for us to toy with!

Its a say day today.

Copies of the prototype are deleted when my... erhm! came on and deleted all the copies!

Development is back to square one
That really sucks. You should save it to dropbox or something next time

Well the good news is, i found a new way to make rockets using a 3d modelling software to produce it as a 2d image.

So the rockets will look better.

Looks cool, don't stop!

Well, sometimes, starting all over again isn't to bad at all. Like you said in you last post, you found a way to make the rockets look better. And because you did everything before, you now know the problems and can find different and maybe better ways to solve it.

Have fun programming, and as said, don't stop this project, it looks like a simple but really fun game. (maybe not as simple as it looks )
I'm bumping this back up to the top for a great concept.
Any news on this?
